name: Death's Favourite Marble
description:
You were unlucky enough to die right after Death dropped their favourite marble down a drain. It's hard to tell, but you think they were sulking. Now your soul is trapped in a marble and you are cursed to keep them entertained for eternity. You try not to think about what will happen if you fail. There's a few stray souls around, perhaps if you collect enough of them you can strike a deal?

  • 3D marble physics platforming!
  • Roll, Jump, Glide and Slam through a procedurally placed infinite level!
  • Use extra lives to unlock new abilities, but be careful not to run out!

Made solo from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44 based on the theme 'Your life is currency'. Tools:

  • Unity 2019.1 with the ProGrids v3 and ProBuilder v4 packages
  • Visual Studio Code
